import React, { Component } from "react" import Card from './CardUI' import img1 from '../assets/m.jpg' import img2 from '../assets/me.png' import img3 from '../assets/me2.jpg' import Flippy, { FrontSide, BackSide } from 'react-flippy'; import './card-style.css' class Cards extends Component{ render(){ return(
this.flippy = r}/// these are optional style, it is not necessary >
); } } export default Cards;
